thread.title: Successful launch of PSLV-C28 ‘moment of immense pride’, says PM Modi
thread.title_full: Successful launch of PSLV-C28 ‘moment of immense pride’, says PM Modi | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Successful launch of PSLV-C28 ‘moment of immense pride’, says PM Modi
text:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday said the successful launch of ISRO’s PSLV-C28 with five UK satellites is a moment of immense pride and joy for India.
“Successful launch of PSLV-C28 with 5 UK satellites is a moment of immense pride & joy for India. Congratulations to the @isro team,” Prime Minister Modi said on twitter.
The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) successfully launched its PSLV-C28 (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle-XL variant) carrying five British satellites yesterday.
The PSLV lifted off on its 30th flight from Satish Dhawan Space Centre in Sriharikota, Andhra Pradesh, with the heaviest ever payload (1,440 kilograms) for a commercial launch.
It was India’s biggest commercial lift-off with five satellites of Britain’s Surrey Satellite Technology Limited and Surrey Space Centre.
 11, 2015 11:05 am
